Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    Question Class This class is used to store the questions and correct answers from the quiz.

    • Method Detail

      • compareAnswers

        public boolean compareAnswers(java.lang.String userAnswer,
                     java.lang.String correctAnswer)
        Used to compare the answer entered by the user with the correct answer
        Parameters:
        userAnswer - the answer entered by the user
        correctAnswer - the correct answer read from the questions file
        Returns:
        true if the answers match, otherwise false

      • getQuestion

        public java.lang.String getQuestion()
        Used to get a String containing the question
        Returns:
        a String of the current question

      • getCorrectAnswer

        public java.lang.String getCorrectAnswer()
        Used to get a String containing the correct answer
        Returns:
        a String of the correct answer to the current question

      • setQuestion

        public void setQuestion(java.lang.String questionText)
        Used to set the current question
        Parameters:
        questionText - a String containing the question

      • setCorrectAnswer

        public void setCorrectAnswer(java.lang.String correctAnswer)
        Used to set the correct answer
        Parameters:
        correctAnswer - a String containing the correct answer
